content.text: 0) In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( "the first four ingredients"@29:55 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
		)
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@18:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "water"@26:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "oil"@33:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "butter"@38:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cocoa"@49:54 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "boil"@67:71 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@77:88 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) pour over dry ingredients; mix well.
3) Add eggs, buttermilk, vanilla and baking soda; mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "eggs"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "buttermilk"@13:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "vanilla"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "baking soda"@37:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "mix"@50:53 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Pour into a greased and floured 15-in pan.
5) Bake at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "375 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "15-20 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean"@46:104 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Meanwhile, for frosting, combine the butter, cream, cocoa and cinnamon in a saucepan.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "combine"@28:35 / AC
		:subtask ( "for frosting"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "the butter"@36:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "cream"@48:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-14 "cocoa"@55:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-15 "cinnamon"@65:73 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a saucepan"@77:87 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Cook and stir over medium heat until butter is melted and mixture is heated through.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Cook and stir"@3:16 / AC
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "medium heat"@22:33 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until butter is melted and mixture is heated through"@34:86 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Remove from the heat; beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( tool-8-0 "the heat"@15:23 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "beat in"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-16 "sugar"@33:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-17 "vanilla"@43:50 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until smooth"@51:63 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
